topic.title: Problem language/de.json could not initialize...
topic.body:
`UiWSGIHandler error: ValueError: Expecting property name: line 59 column 1 (char 1958) in UiServer.py line 40 > pywsgi.py line 909 > pywsgi.py line 893 > TranslateSitePlugin.py line 64 > SiteStorage.py line 266 > __init__.py line 291 > __init__.py line 339 > decoder.py line 364 > decoder.py line 380´

Can anyone help?

topic.title: problem: ZeroBlog with large video files
topic.body:
So how can i use files at about 100mb? I want to link the videos in a HTML5 Videotag. Like this:
~~~
<video controls="" width="100%" height="auto" src="path/to/video.webm" type="video/webm"></video>
~~~

But every time i get the message: 


>Signierung des Inhalts fehlgeschlagen
>Content too large 131865586B > 10485760B, aborting task...

Please help. Any Idea?

1511129087_19czZMtAoro4WBfRHtjRrSLosuwRn.body: This Problem allmost appear when i modify the "de.json" file in "ZeroBlog"... Deleting solve the Problem, but i want to read my blog in my native language.

I cloned a fresh zeroblog. From here: Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit . 
I copied my "de.json" into the language directory.
So it seems to work. And it works perfectly.
Now i modify or overwrite the "de.json" and and i can not run my new zeroblog.
I rename it to de1.json and it works. I delete it and it works.
Whats going wrong here? Any tips?

here is my de.json file... now there is a problem after copying, not only modifying or overwriting. ~~~~ { "Add new post": "Einen Beitrag hinzufügen", "Follow in Newsfeed": "Folge diesen Neuigkeiten", "Username mentions": "Erwähnungen von anderen Teilnehmer", "Posts": "Beiträge", "0 Comments:": "0 Kommentare:", "Comments": "Kommentare", "Following": "Folgen", "Like this post": "Gefällt mir", "Latest comments:": "Neueste Kommentare:", "Reply": "Antworten", "Bold": "Fett", "Italic": "Kursiv", "Strikethrough": "Durchgestrichen", "Code": "Code", "Link": "Link", "Type or paste link here": "Tippe oder füge einen Link hier ein", "**bold**": "**fett**", "_italic_": "_kursiv_", "strikethrough": "durchgestrichen", "- Lists": "- Listen", "1. Numbered lists": "Erste Liste", "[Links](http://www.zeronet.io)": "[Links](http://www.zeronet.io)", "[References][1]
[1]: Can be used": "[Referenz][1]
[1]: Kann benutzt werden", "> Quotes": "> Ziate", "--- Horizontal rule": "--- Horizontale Linie", "More comments": "Mehr Kommentare...", "Sign in as...": "Anmelden als...", "Submit comment": "Kommentieren", "Please sign in": "Bitte anmelden", "new comment": "Neuer Kommentar", "used: ": "Benutzt: ", " minutes ago": " Minuten vergangen", " hours ago": " Stunden vergangen", " days ago": " Tage vergangen", "on ": "den ", "Just now": "Gerade", "less than 1 min read": "Unter einer Minute zu lesen", " min read": " Minuten zu lesen", "Content changed": "Inhalt wurde verändert", "Sign & Publish new content": "Anmelden und veröffentliche neuen Inhalt", " Editing: ": " Bearbeiten: ", "Save": "Speichern", "Cancel": "Abbrechen", "Delete ": "Löschen", "Prev page": "Vorherige Seite", "Next page": "Nächste Seite", "Not found": "Nicht gefunden", "Content changed": "Inhalt wurde verändert", } ~~~~

> [nofish](#comment_1057_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You have to remove the last , character.You can check it by using https://jsonlint.com/

Thank you!!! So easy... if you know what to do.

1511152066_19czZMtAoro4WBfRHtjRrSLosuwRn.body:
> [bayw4oq7wx5pbgb5](#comment_1_16adTqUqDgQ9FvXMtskaN8v2XjvFgYKfJd): you have to make the video optional [...]

Have you an example how to implement the "optional"-feature? So step by step. Thanks.
